definition[0]: if fighting, violence, noise etc erupts, it starts suddenly
example[0]: Violence erupted after police shot a student during the demonstration.
example[1]: A political row erupted over the MPâ€™s comments.
definition[1]: if a volcano erupts, it explodes and sends smoke, fire, and rock into the sky
definition[2]: if a place or situation erupts, there is a sudden increase in activity or emotion
example[2]: They were angry to the point of erupting into riot.
example[3]: Their conversations often erupted into squabbles.
definition[3]: if spots erupt on your body, they suddenly appear on your skin
